event.title: [CHANGE OF PLAN] Bristol Creative Code #1: Down To The Wire with Triple Geek
event.description:
*** CHANGE OF PLAN ***
For this first Meetup we'll go along to this creative technology event about Modular visual synthesis. Because it looks interesting and related to creative technology: https://www.facebook.com/events/2041416449208611/

• What we'll do
This meetup is for anyone who is interested in using code creatively, physical computing and digital art. Including Unity, Open Frameworks, Processing, Pure Data etc.

The format of this first meetup will be:

Welcome & Meet everyone
Show & Tell: present a project if you wish
Work on a personal project / Look at Open Frameworks and Houdini together. As this is the first Meetup, we will have a discussion about how we might format the meetup so that it is helpful and fun for everybody,

In the future we may run:
Workshops
Hacknights

• What to bring
A laptop and and an open mind

• Important to know
